definition: "silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]

definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
